inclusion.criterion: diagnosis of CF by sweat testing/genetics
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: vitamin D deficiency defined as a serum 25OHD level < 75 nmol/L
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: on stable baseline vitamin D supplementation for at least 2 months
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Individuals with known hypercalcemia or renal stones
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: use of tanning beds/travel to sunny location within the last 2 months
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has Paget's Disease of Bone, which may be a contraindication for vitamin D supplementation.
